subdisciplines.name: Environmental Toxicology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the effects of chemicals on the environment and the organisms that inhabit it.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Organic Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior of organic compounds in the environment, including their sources, fate, and effects.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Inorganic Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior of inorganic compounds in the environment, including their sources, fate, and effects.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Analytical Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The development and application of analytical methods to measure chemicals in the environment.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Physical Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical behavior of chemicals in the environment, including their reactions, transport, and partitioning.
